title: Graviteam Tactics: Mius-Front
notes: Initial menu, sounds, configuration, ok. The game crashes after a few minutes of starting the action. The message is "001 Program initialization error". It leaves a error dump in a zip file.

title: The Uncertain: Episode 1 - The Last Quiet Day
notes: Start with the "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1" option. There is sound and the game doesn't crash, but no display. Only color changing screen

Crashes with "001 program initialization error"  after running for a minute or two.  But it seems to run fine if all sound is turned off.  
  Options, 3rd page, "Sound: Disabled".
title: Graviteam Tactics: Mius-Front
